features: MULTI-PURPOSE TOOL - This long handle wall mop can be used to clean walls, ceilings, baseboards, floors, door or window trim, and corners. Also included scrubber and a squeegee that can clean windows, showers, and windshields with ease. make housework easier!

LONG-HANDLED - This cleaning tools kit includes 5 metal extension poles, wall cleaner he 25-85 inch metal long handle lets you clean high or low without a ladder or bending over. the lightweight metal poles were easy to lift overhead to use and greatly reduces fatigue.

SLIM & FLEXIBLE HEAD DESIGN - The 180°swivels triangle mop head can be bent into various angles you want, cleaning all kinds of dead angles and hard-to-reach areas, and it’s slim enough to fit under furniture.

WET & DRY MOPS - wall cleaning tool brush with Upgraded Thicker replacement pads. Chenille dry mop pads for grabbing all the dust from your walls, ceilings, fans, etc. Microfiber mop pads for removing dust, grit, grease, and other grime, The pads can be machine washed and re-used.
SATISFACTION - Both a satisfying buying experience and lifetime customer service are offered. 30 days after the date of purchase Wall mop, the product is guaranteed, Stylish gift packaging.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: MULTIFUNCTIONAL WALL MOP CLEANING TOOL Lil BODEGA Wall mop - Your All-in-One Solution!" Upgrade your Cleaning Game with the Lil BODEGA Wall mop. This comprehensive kit, featuring a long-handled wall mop, effortlessly keeps your windows streak-free and surfaces immaculate. Equipped with 3 Microfiber Pads, 3 Chenille Pads, and 1 Squeegee, this multitasking tool is perfect for both baseboards and windows. The 5-Stage Extension Pole, ranging from 25'' to 85'', ensures easy one-handed operation, eliminating the need for ladders. Adaptable to ceilings, windows, sofas, or beds, the Lil BODEGA Wall mop with Long Handle is user-friendly with its adjustable extension rod. Elevate your cleaning routine effortlessly.

DOMESTIC CLEANER MULTIFUNCTIONAL CLEANER TOOL Introducing our Versatile Cleaner Tool, perfect for effortlessly cleaning walls, ceilings, baseboards, corners, doors, windows, and cars. Included is a Window Squeegee to ensure effective cleaning of windows, showers, and windshields.

180° ROTATABLE WALL MOP VERSATILE HEAD CONFIGURATION The Adjustable 180-Degree Head Configuration offers maximum adaptability, making it well-suited for a variety of cleaning tasks. Whether it's walls, ceilings, baseboards, or tight corners, this innovative feature ensures comprehensive cleaning with complete freedom of movement.

HANDY STORAGE SEAMLESS ORGANIZATION Our Wall mop, with its Long Head and Handle, easily fits into the Mesh Bag for compact storage. The breathable Mesh Material prevents dampness and odors, while the Hanging Hooks make it a breeze to store the mop on the wall. Simplify your cleaning routine with our concise and convenient Wall Mop solution.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 9, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars A game changer for all the hard-to-reach areas!
reviews.reviewText: I recently purchased the 85 Inch Wall Mop Cleaner with a Long Handle, and I must say it has exceeded my expectations in every way. The design of the cleaner is brilliant, offering a perfect solution for tackling hard-to-reach places like ceilings, walls, and baseboards.The extendable handle, ranging from 25" to an impressive 85", provides unmatched flexibility, allowing me to effortlessly reach high corners and broad surfaces without any strain. This versatility makes it an excellent tool for various cleaning tasks around the house.The inclusion of 6 replacement microfiber chenille pads is a thoughtful touch. These pads not only effectively trap dust and dirt but are also durable and reusable, making the cleaner a sustainable choice. The easy attachment and detachment of the pads make the cleaning process hassle-free, and the chenille material ensures a thorough and gentle clean.What sets this cleaner apart is its efficiency in dealing with different surfaces. Whether it's wiping down walls, cleaning baseboards, or reaching high windows, the mop head adapts seamlessly, leaving surfaces spotless. The microfiber material picks up even the finest dust particles, ensuring a thorough clean every time.I appreciate the quality construction of the cleaner, which feels sturdy and durable. The thoughtful design and attention to detail make it evident that the manufacturer prioritizes user convenience. Assembling the cleaner was a breeze, and the materials used inspire confidence in its long-lasting performance.In conclusion, the 85 Inch Wall Mop Cleaner has become an indispensable tool in my cleaning arsenal. It combines functionality, durability, and ease of use in a way that genuinely enhances the cleaning experience. I highly recommend it to anyone in need of a reliable and versatile cleaning solution for those hard-to-reach areas. It's a game-changer!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 5, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Multi-Use! Versatile! Awesome Mop!
reviews.reviewText: The adjustable pole is a lifesaver – no more struggling to reach the tops of windows and those high corners. It's like having an extra-long arm without the awkward stretching. Plus, the fact that it's extendable from 25 to 85 inches is a major win for someone dealing with high ceilings like mine.What really impressed me is how well it handles baseboards. The microfiber chenille pads do an excellent job picking up dust and dirt, leaving my baseboards looking brand new. And hey, they throw in six replacement pads, which is great because, let's be honest, cleaning is an ongoing thing.Now, the cute black netted storage bag – that's the kind of detail I appreciate. It keeps everything together and tucks away neatly in my small closet. It might sound trivial, but when you're short on space, these things matter.In a nutshell, if you're living in a cozy space like mine and want a cleaning tool that can handle the heights and tight spots, the Lil Bodega Wall Mop Cleaner is a solid choice. It's made my cleaning life a lot easier, and I'm all about that.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 25, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Extremely versatile! Must have in your cleaning arsenal
reviews.reviewText: It’s not everyday you find a product of such high quality and functionality. Shoutout to Lil Bodega for this product. It’s allowed me to reach corners that I used to need a ladder for and clean with such precision! I’ve also used it for car windshield.You can’t go wrong with this product!Well done Lil Bodega!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 20, 2024
reviews.reviewText: LOVE this MOP!I have been through so many mops in the past years and this one beats them all! Very compact, easy to use, heavy duty, not flimsy like some extension poles and works great for big open foyer walls and corners , I do recommend this mop you will not regret!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 10, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great Wall Mop
reviews.reviewText: Once I received the wall mop I put it to use right away. The extension poles are great for reaching all places that need to be cleaned. I cleaned my ceilings, walls and this mop works great for cobwebbing. You can also use the mop to reach behind and under furniture to get to those hard to reach places. This product will help make cleaning chores a breeze.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 31, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Great, until it broke
reviews.reviewText: I recieved my package today and was eager to test it out. Easy to put together and I liked how many cleaning pads it came with.I got it all together and went to work. I sprayed some Theives on the walls and started wiping and the dirt, dust, and kids messes came off fairly easily, so I decided to go ahead and clean the walls in the dining room, bathroom, and living room. Getting through that was very quick and left the walls refreshed.However, the last wall in the living room, the mop head turned, as it does to go around and along the edges, and the part that the handle attaches to the head, snapped. The handle is mostly metal, so no bending or give in it, which is great, but to clip on the head of the mop is an orange plastic piece, which is the part that broke, the head and handle are otherwise fine. The ease and happiness was short lived, unfortunately.If that attachment piece was a metal clip instead of a plastic one, this product would hands down be 5 stars, but that design flaw makes it to where if the head turns just a little bit in the "wrong" direction, as it's supposed to turn some and does quite a bit if you're not at the perfect angle, then the piece breaks. If they changed that one piece, I'd happily buy again, but until then, I have to find a better product with a sturdier connector.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 16, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Impressive wall mop kit
reviews.reviewText: I recently got the large wall mop with typical accessories, and it's a game-changer. The wide mop head covers a lot of ground swiftly, and the included extras like extra pads and a sturdy handle make it a complete package. Versatile, efficient, and a real time-saver – highly recommend!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 7, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I love the shape and length. It has been very helpful to get in corners that I couldn’t reach without it!
